channel.title: Command Converting Help 317-562

item.title: Command Converting Help 317-562
item.dc:creator: @laurent_248 laurent 248
item.description:
@laurent_248 wrote:

Sorry try it i fixed.

if(player.getRights() > 1) { if (cmd[0].equals("update")) { for (Player pl : World.getInstance().getPlayerList()) { if (pl != null) { pl.getActionSender().sendSystemUpdate(100); } } } }

i forgot a slash…

item.title: Command Converting Help 317-562
item.dc:creator: @laurent_248 laurent 248
item.description:
@laurent_248 wrote:

Sorry i forgot a slash, try this :

if(player.getRights() > 1) { if (cmd[0].equals("update")) { for (Player pl : World.getInstance().getPlayerList()) { if (pl != null) { pl.getActionSender().sendSystemUpdate(100); } } } }

item.title: Command Converting Help 317-562
item.dc:creator: @laurent_248 laurent 248
item.description:
@laurent_248 wrote:

lol theres the command for 1 min

if(player.getRights() > 1) { if (cmd[0].equals("update")) { for (Player pl : World.getInstance().getPlayerList()) { if (pl != null) { pl.getActionSender().sendSystemUpdate(100); } } }

I hope i helped

Read full topic

item.title: Command Converting Help 317-562
item.dc:creator: @kickyamom50 kickyamom50
item.description:
@kickyamom50 wrote:

Okay well my 562 didn’t have the update command, so i copyed it from an old 317 of mine into the commandPacketHandler so only admins can do it, i converted as much as i knew at this moment, and i need someone to please finish it for me, i need this command converted the reset of the way please :S

			if(cmd[0].equals("update") && (command.length() > 7)
					if (player.getRights() <= 0)
					return;
				PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command
						.substring(7)) + 1);
				PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false;
				PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true;
				PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
			}

Yeah i know i’m dumb with commands, that’s why i use a command generator for most <.<[/code]

Read full topic
